column3: “A very good Sativa effect. I was impressed with the taste and longevity of the effects. Was medicated for hours feeling very uplifted and happy. Took care of my anxiety and I had no problems doing day to day activities. Overall very good strain, I would definitely recommend giving  it a try.”

“This is my new favorite sativa.  The buds on the batch I acquired are huge and covered in trichomes.  The smell is amaing although there wasn't much of a taste to it.  Nice smooth, expansive smoke that will take even the seasoned smokers to new hights.  This strain is perfect for day time use and wake and bakes.  The high is one of the longer lasting ones I've experienced, especially for a sativa.  Green Candy is a m...”
“A true sativa with great uplift and buds that are robust and dense. Its a solid 8.5 for me.  Blended well with Skywalker!  Thanks Swell.”

“If you have anxiety issues I recommend you either find another strain, or mix it with a heavy Indica to balance it out.

Beautiful, sweet, sugary and skunky-pungent smells reel from these compact little nugs. But (and keep in mind, I smoke all day everyday) this stuff just rubbed me the wrong way when smoked alone. I got The Fear, which I hadn't really experienced in awhile. It mellowed out after I smoked a little sn...”

“Holy cow talk about uplifting!
I haven't been in the best mood lately someone close to me died. I picked this up while grieving and it made me feel so much better!
Colors were more stimulating, everything had a glow to it, and the world seemed like a brighter place.
best antidepressant ever”
“Beautiful and delicious. The dispensary listed it as a spiritual buzz
column4:
and I couldn't agree more. It is very uplifting, inspiring, and creative in nature. 

The aroma is VERY fruity and EXTREMELY strong. One pinch and your nostrils are filled with the delicious aroma of this quality medicine. 

It is my new favorite sativa.”

column3: “Green Candy has been, by a wide margin, the best smoke I've had so far. With only a few puffs of this potent sativa all of my stress and anxiety melted away along with waves of euphoria and all my aches and pains disappearing. I was especially pleased that this strain didn't cause me any paranoia as some sativas can, and left me focused, energized and feeling great. If Green Crack's high had too much of an edge for y...”

“First go around with this strain was flower, it was like a very sweet tasting Green Crack. Definitely tastes like candy!
I've never had Candy Kush on it's own, but I'm guessing the candy tastes comes from the candy kush, duh.
This is a great strain for lethargy, depression, stress, nausea, and pain. I wouldn't recommend this for anxiety prone patients. 
This is the perfect sativa for wake & bake sessions. Or as a pic...”
“Very strong stativa! Gets me up off my butt, and allowed me to get stuff done with out the stress”
“One of the top 5 sativas.  I always want this as part of my available medications.”

“Fresh flower through a recently clean bong (less than a day of use).   The flavor is average, a bright green taste with a hint of flowers and pine. It's labeled Green Candy, so it could be Green Crack or it could be the Green Candy hybrid, Green Crack x Candy Kush.  SOOO few budtenders know the difference, but I suspect this to be the hybrid. It has the more mild feel I associate with Candy vs the energetic edge I as...”
“Known to me locally as Christmas Bud"
column4: I normally only see this strain around in September through January. The buds are usually very dense and shaped like Christmas Trees. Upon looking
column5: it's dark green and full of crystals. It smells sweet and has a slight pine smell. Taste is amazing! Tastes of sweet smoke fill my lungs. It's almost like smoking sugared pot. Makes you feel very energetic at first if you smoke a sm...”"

column3: “I used a disposable vape pen preloaded with green candy concentrate. It felt like a stimulant but only the good effects of one. I was so happy and energized. It kept me up when I needed to be and calmed me down when I was having mood swings. Love it.”

“If a stranger were to offer me THIS type of candy, I may willingly enter their unmarked van. Totally safe!

Dense, dusty and crusty... a promisingly stony combo. And the smell? It's irresistible, with a crispness that cuts to the back of the nose. The perfect balance of sour and sweet.

To top it off, I'm pretty sure a million-dollar idea surfaced during this smoke sesh with friends... Green Candy kicks butt!”

“This strain is incredible. I met with a teacher while high off my ass on this. I had one of the most successful impromptu photo shoots I've ever had, and the incredible creative juices were flowing hard for me. The high was euphoric.”

“Great Sativa. Kills the edge of the green Crack perfectly. Swell in AZ had my best example. Washed and waxed my car.. Went to throw away trash, cut the grass on a whim. Super energetic. Hard crash when done. For me at least.”

“I've yet to smoke the flower but green candy shatter(If purchased from a reliable source) is beyond amazing. Instant body melt and the head high is out of this world. This is the first strain I feel has plenty of head & body while still being very strong.”

“If a stranger were to offer me THIS type of candy, I may willingly enter their unmarked van. Totally safe!

Dense, dusty and crusty... a promisingly stony combo. And the smell? It's irresistible, with a crispness that cuts to the back of the nose. The perfect balance of sour and sweet.

To top it off, I'm pretty sure a million-dollar idea surfaced during this smoke sesh with friends... Green Candy kicks butt!”

“This strain is incredible. I met with a teacher while high off my ass on this. I had one of the most successful impromptu photo shoots I've ever had, and the incredible creative juices were flowing hard for me. The high was euphoric.”
“Great strain, very tasty. Gives you a very fruity favor at first then a very good earthy taste to finish. Made my headache go away. Strong body high.”

“love this strain. the only other stativa dominant strain I've had that's helped with back pain as much as the 501st Street strain. both helped with my back pain better than any other. seems like it could have a bit more of a tarpon level. doesn't have that great pungent flavor like Gorilla Glue. totally different ballgame there tho. however taste is still fresh, crisp,  sweet, pine, and a green taste. the smell of a ...”
“Fantastic strain. Fruity scent, reminds me of tangerines. I would recommend enjoying this strain just before doing work around the house. It provides endless motivation!”
“Totally chilled me out when I was having a really severe PMS mood swing. Made me happy and calm but energized.”

“My favorite strain of all time. A fantastic, happy, overwhelmingly positive and feel-good high. As a recreational user, I have never felt so many medical benefits from the 3.5g I was blessed enough to inhale.”

“I received this bud from swell farmacy located in youngtown, arizona. 

Upon arriving home after my 12 hour shift at work I decide to bring out the bong and pour some lemonade in it and smoke some Green candy. After a few hits I was not really feeling much of anything. I take one more hit and I thrown so far up in HEAD HIGH HEAVEN IM ROLLING ON THE FLOOR WITH GLEE. Dry but my gosh so good good delicious flavor”
“If you see me in traffic, halla at the Green Candy! Ah way Blaze iit!”
“possibly the best strain I have tried in 30 + years of smoking. I was fortunate enough to find some seeds in a couple ounces I had. started one got a beautiful female mother.”

“My favorite strain of all time. A fantastic, happy, overwhelmingly positive and feel-good high. As a recreational user, I have never felt so many medical benefits from the 3.5g I was blessed enough to inhale.”
“I really thought I was gonna like this and I don't hate it but it gave me the jitters like crazy. I think I just need to find the right dosage with this one. Careful with the intake.”
“Fantastic strain. Fruity scent, reminds me of tangerines. I would recommend enjoying this strain just before doing work around the house. It provides endless motivation!”
“So loud !! looks , smells and taste great !”
“Very relaxing, but still be able to function.”
“Better than coffee. I was full of piss and vinager. I couldn't sit still, had to be up and moving around. I also felt great. if you haven't tried this, it a must for sativa lovers.”
“Good lasting high!!!”
“Smell is on point. Flavor lingers for a while but overall nice and heady.”

“A cross between Green Crack and Cotten Candy.
Tastes Like Christmas! Great for with your friends and letting your mind and imagination run free. Makes you feel very happy and upbeat one of the best sativas I have had and I'm very picky about my sativas.”
“My driver had called it Green Taffy" but I don't know if he meant Candy?? Its a northern Cali grown was maybe seeing if I could figure some out. I have photos.”"
“Green candy co2  oil is amazing. so much flavor and the cerebral high is immaculate.”
“Verrrrry relaxed and calm. Would recommend.”
“Good for watching movies about space and time.”

“I found this strain to be very relaxing.  It really helped out with my Seasonal Allergies as well as headache, nausea, and general aches and pains. I also found that it was a useful appetite stimulator.  
i also found that due to the high CBD content i was able to continue working without difficulty.”

“This is a great strain. I'm usually lean more towards indicas because of my anxiety but this strain was great. Very clear - headed after smoking it. Definitely uplifting and left me in a happy mood. The smoke was mild on my lungs and the taste was incomparable. Really sweet yet earthy with a very pleasant aroma when burned. Definitely a new favorite of mine.”
“Loved it,  It really helped with my pain and helped me relax.”
“Super fire really sweet and good”

“One of the best tasting strains I've tried. Tastes kind of like a sweet green apple. Very aromatic and sweet flavor. Pungent and a tiny bit citrusy as well. The high is pretty uplifting and euphoric. Mild cerebral effects which turn into a mellow high. Definitely a 5/5 for me. Enjoy!”
“Great head buzz...very unenergetic.”

“Green Candy is the despensery version of the Humboldt favorite Green Crack. This ultra stoney weed is grown for releiving severe pain and is the prefect sleep medicine. 1 too many hits of this might dig you a deeper hole then you can climb out of.”
“Looks great. Beautiful buds. For a sativa, I expected more of a high than what I got. not a fave.”

“Meh... very weak Sativa in my opinion. 
the buds are nice to look at and the smell is tempting. for flavour of smoke it's actually pretty boring and the high, well; very weak but clear -headed I guess. I wouldn't recommend this strain to an aquaintence.”

“I found this strain to be very relaxing.  It really helped out with my Seasonal Allergies as well as headache, nausea, and general aches and pains. I also found that it was a useful appetite stimulator.  
i also found that due to the high CBD content i was able to continue working without difficulty.”
“its pretty delicious. i felt like really energetic and happy when i tried it then about 2 hours later i fell asleep. i think ill use this on halloween to have the energy to go trick or treating :D”
“Took a few bong rips. Felling pretty good. Good smoke before school high I feel like. Smells to me super fruity almost like fruity pebbles but taste more like spice or wood. Would buy.”
“This weed is great for talking. Conversations will be constructive or logical. Makes me really happy and I feel uplifted.”

“Incredible mentally calming high. It keeps me uplifted while making everything around me seem great.
Such a carefree strain.”
“Very good taste. I loved everything about it.”
“A get you thinking" kind of high
column4: which probably led me to write this review. Got me thinking this is some decent ganja. I needed two bowls
column7: to be pretty damn high until dinnertime. Assuming the label matched the product
column8: the bud was sticky and stringy. The pics on here matched what I got

column1: One more thing to note was that ther...”"

column3: “Taste good obviously, Body Blown mostly. Good onset.”

“really enjoyed this one. great smell out of the bag. fruit and you can make out that candy kush sugary smell.  with the green crack X the head change is fast and it doesn't last that long, longer as compared to pure green X.  You'll find yourself re-upping and then expect a steep crash filled with frantic munchies and then sleep.”

“I don't have alot of energy. Im very lethargic but this strain has such a different feel to it I don't find myself drained after I smoke. Very sweet after taste and a good strong uplifting feeling. A new fav.”

“This strain makes all of the greens greener and the candies sweeter! I paired it with a Herrer wax and it was smooth, sweet, a little soft tbh, and stargazingly stoney. Apparently it also has a creative kick to it as I am using very strange writing tones and inflections in all of the weirdest places? I'm joking; I give it 5 stars cuz it literally made the day brighter.”

“Picked up some really fresh Green Candy from Swell Famacy in Az.  Deli style, so the buds were super fresh.  The buds are really frosty and colorful, dense and full of orange hairs.  Visually it's very impressive, and the smell is a sweet aroma of citrus with a hint of orange peel.  The buds were very soft to the touch when prepping to smoke.  Very silky smooth smoke with a sweet after taste that you can taste.  This...”

“Really helps with anxiety!!! No lazy blah feeling; no drowsiness. Really helps to level you out so you can keep going on with the day. Absolutely would recommend it for depression, stress, and anxiety.”
“Love this strain! Great uplifter that helps my creativity, and also helps me stay awake.”

“very nice sativa for people who usually consider themselves an indica person. The kush cross keeps you physically comfortable and calm like an indica would, but still has that great green crack kick. As someone with ptsd I love this for daytime. Keeps me happy, keeps me calm. Overall a great strain for people who want to medicate for mental health concerns because of it's balance.”

“This strain relaxed and blissed me out.  The first time the effect was amazing, It forcefully relaxed my body, which is what I need, I have PTSD and tension is most of the time with stress.  This strain transports me from that tension.  I prefer a sativa most days, this one has a great body effect.”
“I found Green Candy was too emotionally numbing.”
“light cerbral effect. Was focused. No body effect. Was, meh...”
“Pretty good sativa.. Was expecting more from this one. High was short-lived.”

“very earthy / musky sweet flavour. I found this strain to effect my body the same way northern lights or a strong kush would, very floaty feeling and good for back pain. while the brain felt active but not overly stimulated like regular green crack. very good high, no paranoia.”
“Glad I got this one great taste and high.”

“chai here in Santa Cruz had this. taste looks, smell, and high are really good. smelled like a green candy lollipop. the high was very up lifting. I used it to balance out the couch lock from platinum girl scout cookies”

“One of the best tasting strains I've tried. Tastes kind of like a sweet green apple. Very aromatic and sweet flavor. Pungent and a tiny bit citrusy as well. The high is pretty uplifting and euphoric. Mild cerebral effects which turn into a mellow high. Definitely a 5/5 for me. Enjoy!”
“My driver had called it Green Taffy" but I don't know if he meant Candy?? Its a northern Cali grown was maybe seeing if I could figure some out. I have photos.”"
“Super sweet super fire and so happy happy would definitely recommend green candy is so good very chill”
“Super fire really sweet and good”
“Good for watching movies about space and time.”
“Good lasting high!!!”

“I love this strain.
Suffer from anxiety and I can use this strain as all day functioning.  I used flower and bong,  I got my last bath from Swell AKA Cureleaf. It is a hard one to find in Phx AZ”
“really enjoyed the flavor as well as the intense head buzz.”
“Found my fave strain!”
“I don't understand why this strain isn't more popular in my area.  I received it as a first time purchase gift and I fell in love.   It is such a bright and happy high.  I love it.”
“My new favorite after Jack herer. Highly airy and Makes me extremely attentive and focused. This will be great for reading or writing. Taste's really well and easy on the lungs. Love this strain!!!”
“Sweet thick smoke, the taste is great. Great cerebral high, a very energetic strain”
“Looks great. Beautiful buds. For a sativa, I expected more of a high than what I got. not a fave.”
“Loved it,  It really helped with my pain and helped me relax.”

“I found this strain to be very relaxing.  It really helped out with my Seasonal Allergies as well as headache, nausea, and general aches and pains. I also found that it was a useful appetite stimulator.  
i also found that due to the high CBD content i was able to continue working without difficulty.”
“Verrrrry relaxed and calm. Would recommend.”
“Green candy co2  oil is amazing. so much flavor and the cerebral high is immaculate.”

“A cross between Green Crack and Cotten Candy.
Tastes Like Christmas! Great for with your friends and letting your mind and imagination run free. Makes you feel very happy and upbeat one of the best sativas I have had and I'm very picky about my sativas.”
“Smell is on point. Flavor lingers for a while but overall nice and heady.”
“Better than coffee. I was full of piss and vinager. I couldn't sit still, had to be up and moving around. I also felt great. if you haven't tried this, it a must for sativa lovers.”
“Very relaxing, but still be able to function.”
“I picked this strain up as wax for my vape pen. Amazing! So uplifting and sparks endless creativity. I love this strain for journaling! Will get again, do recommend!”

“THIS STRAIN WAS LIKE WHOA WHOA IT MAde ME HELLA SQUIRMY AND I WAS IN A ROOM FULL OF FRAT BOYD AND I JUST WANT ED TO RUN AROUND WHILE SICK MUSIC WAS PLAYING (likr animal collective) THEN WE WERE WATCHING HUMAN PLANET AND THE INUITS CAUGHT THIS SEA SHARK AND THEN I PASSeD OUT
good for being active”

“Love Green Crack, I specially Love Green Candy the most. It's  more of a relax feeling to battle anxiety and paranoia. I love everyone from Point Loma collective for hooking me up like always they sure know their Medicine.”
“With not many traces of Green Crack" left on the market
column4: a lot of places looking for a quality sativa
column5: with the matching taste/smell have started to carry Green Candy.

column1: For all who were fans of the high potency of Green Crack with the clear heady-ness
column2: clean smoke with sticky buds and sweet flavor. This is the sativa for you! 4.5/5”"

column3: “Top shelf stuff...extremely nice high, you could smoke a bowl and talk to your boss type herb.  Yummy time!!”
“Love this! Definitely a peppy, keep you awake and fun strain. Smells amazing and tastes even better. Very soft and fluffy!”
“Tasty and aromatic good buzz”

“First time use, was very nice feeling. Great smell and taste.  Immediately felt happy and relaxed.  Lasted about an hour and a half.  Highly recommend for headaches during the day.  It will help with the pain, but not make you pass out.  So you will still be able to function once the pain is relieved.”

“Great Sativa. Quick to the head, very energetic, wanted to get up and do... A lot!

Washed and waxed the car,went to throw away trash... Cut the grass on a whim. Yeah, super energetic.”
“its pretty delicious. i felt like really energetic and happy when i tried it then about 2 hours later i fell asleep. i think ill use this on halloween to have the energy to go trick or treating :D”
“4 stars. In only my experience, long high? yes. transcendence high"? no. But I'm sane and creative. This sativa strain still made me want to dance. Smooth taste
column5: no harshness. Good for creation and music and just wanting a chill stay-at-home day.”"

column3: “this was a good day flower.med size buds..good for an ok price.”
“that green candy some dank on my momma”
